name: Baldi's Basics Maze Challenge!
description:
Story:

Uh oh! Looks like you managed to get out of Baldi's schoolhouse but Baldi have challenges for you to try! Can you beat them all?

This is Baldi's Basics fan game!!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left click - Interact

ESC - Pause

Left shift - Run

Tab - Map

M - Big map/Advanced map

Credits:

Mystman12/Basically Games - creator of Baldi's Basics

Nanes Potatoes - creator of Baldi model for anim8or

You can download on gamebanana too!

Here link: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/11555
